text: Omuwendo gwonna ogw’ebisolo ebyaweebwayo olw’ekiweebwayo ekyokebwa gwali bwe guti: ente ento ennume kkumi na bbiri, endiga ennume kkumi na bbiri, abaana b’endiga abato abalume ab’omwaka ogw’obukulu gumu baali kkumi na babiri, awamu n’ekiweebwayo eky’emmere y’empeke n’ebigenderako. Embuzi ennume kkumi na bbiri ze zaakozesebwa olw’ekiweebwayo olw’ekibi.
